Articles.Content: This is just a question I had. Would KSP 2 have only planets designed by the developers, or would it also have procedurally generated planets?

5 minutes ago, DoctorKerman said:

This is just a question I had. Would KSP 2 have only planets designed by the developers, or would it also have procedurally generated planets?

Pretty sure all of the new planets and stars were designed by developers. But some of the smaller surface features are procedural to avoid spending hundreds of years designing hills of course

We have only seen designed planets so far, which really means that the overall landscape and aesthetic of the planet are designed and then procedural generation is used to fill in the details that the artists have specified. I think there is a commitment to having a few designed planets instead of a lot of procedural ones, but I don't remember if/where that was said explicitly.

Outside of dev-made and procedural, based on the dev's plan to make modding easier, and it being the most obvious mod to add planets and solar systems, I'm sure modding in planets and solar systems will be really easy.
